name: L.A.'S HAIRTRENDS, INC., Respondent v. Gina TOMAN, Formerly known as Gina Krepak, Rebecca Howze, Formerly known as Rebecca Lichtenwalner and Luann Horvath, t/d/b/a The Plaza Salon, Petitioners

parties: L.A.’S HAIRTRENDS, INC., Respondent v. Gina TOMAN, Formerly known as Gina Krepak, Rebecca Howze, Formerly known as Rebecca Lichtenwalner and Luann Horvath, t/d/b/a The Plaza Salon, Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of August 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby STAYED with respect to Gina Toman, formerly known as Gina Krepak, due to her filing of a Petition for Bankruptcy in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania at Docket No. 04-26257.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED with respect to all other Petitioners.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
882 A.2d 1002
L.A.’S HAIRTRENDS, INC., Respondent v. Gina TOMAN, Formerly known as Gina Krepak, Rebecca Howze, Formerly known as Rebecca Lichtenwalner and Luann Horvath, t/d/b/a The Plaza Salon, Petitioners.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 26, 2005.
